Posts.Content: Jun 1, 2011 04:31PM beausoleil wrote: this biopsy came back benign, (YAY!!!) but the surgeon wants to see me in 2 weeks to test the discharge (there is very little and it is non-spontaneous, so he is hoping for enough to test then) and if it is possible for blood he wants to do a galactogram. I am kindof leaning towards forget that and go straight to excising the ducts myself.
Posts.Title: sick with fear beausoleil mommyrnx2

Posts.Content: beausoleil wrote: I am so so scared.  Two years ago I had clear discharge from the right nipple, lots of it. Spontaneous discharge. They did a mammo and a diagnostic mammo, both clear. After that they said I needed no more followup. The spontaneous discharge has been gone for a year now.   During a self breast exam I got brown discharge last Friday, but only when pressing and was not able to get much. Called in, had a mammo Monday and a docters appointment Tuesday. They did additional views that morning plus a thorough ultrasound.Nothing showed up and no change fro 2 years ago.  The radiologist said she is less worried about brown discharge, that she can work a brown discharge out of almost every woman my age if she works at it ( I am 42) But she sent me to a breast surgeon that same afternoon. The OB had done a breast exam  and said she could find absolutely no palpable mass whatsoever.   The breast surgeon did an exam and said:"I found a lump". He biopsied it right there in the office. He said :"If it was any smaller  I would not be able to feel it". during the biopsy he looked at the tissue and seemed a bit surprised and said:" Hmm I am getting a lot of fatty tissue" The nurse said that was good, but I don't want to get my hopes up. Then he took 2 more samples and he looked more serious.Can they tell it is bad just by looking??!! I am so so terrified. I keep reading how a discharge with a lump is almost always bad news.  So I wait. For results. I am so afraid. It feels like my whole world has come crashing down. I have 7 kids, several young ones. I can't eat. I cant sleep. I have had hip pain over the outside of my left him with movement that comes and goes, and I am just terrified that I will hear I have bone mets already, .  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: sick with fear beausoleil mommyrnx2

Posts.Content: May 26, 2011 08:48PM beausoleil wrote: 48 hours.I still have not heard. I am losing it. I have had issues with my left hip for a year and half now...burning pain over the outside when I walk or climb stairs. It has disappeared completely before and then it has returned if I walk too much or run...and I am so scared that this means I have bone mets.  I can't sleep. I can't eat. It has been a week since I found the brown discharge and I am so wiped out.
Posts.Title: sick with fear beausoleil mommyrnx2

Posts.Content: May 27, 2011 05:12PM beausoleil wrote: Okay, update. The doctor said the pathologist sent out the tissue for some further testing. He said that when he talked to the pathologist he did not call it cancer, and he did not even call it pre-cancer. He sent out tissue though, so I will not know until Tuesday at the earliest. I asked the doctor:"If he thought it was cancer, would he have said so" and the doc said "yes". I am so confused.
